description: From Middle English wantounly, wantounliche, equivalent to wanton +‎ -ly.

adverbs.description: wantonly (comparative more wantonly, superlative most wantonly)

examples: Undoubtedly Madam—and it has always been a sentiment of mine—that to propagate a malicious Truth wantonly—is more despicable than to falsify from Revenge  […]
